mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing the Grand Ole Opry Fan Fair with Bill Monroe, Jim and Jesse, Lester Flatt, Mac Wiseman, Ralph Stanley, Wilma Lee and Stanley Cooper at the Municipal Auditorium on June 9. Poster features metal photoplates of Bill Monroe, Jim and Jesse, Lester Flatt, Mac Wiseman, Ralph Stanley, Wilma Lee and Stanley Cooper. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/22550.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
